About This Game

This hero of the Marvel Universe is not like the other characters. It is generally no one else like! He hears voices , he said to the players , he loves Mexican food and groovy girls in bikinis. He is able to save the world like no other , turning it into a continuous occupation pathetic joke . Someone says he crazy, but his army of fans argues differently . He - Deadpool . He can be everything!
